org.webcycle.hexml
Class Vocabulary

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.webcycle.hexml.Vocabulary
public class Vocabulary
extends java.lang.Object

a parser's vocabulary. Maps tag names (keys) to Class objects (values) to be instantiated when the tags are found. Can load itself from a file.

          maps tag names (keys) to Class objects

loadFromFile

public void loadFromFile(java.io.File f)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         java.io.IOException
Load our vocabulary by parsing from the given file.
Parameters:
f - the file from which to parse
allowOnlyVocabEntries - whether to ignore everything except VocabEntry instances
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - when f isn't found
java.io.IOException - on an error reading f
